privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us
privacy.contactUs: Contact our privacy team for any concerns

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect information you provide directly, including:
• Name, email address, and phone number
• Booking and reservation details
• Payment information (processed securely)
• Order history and preferences
• Device and browser information for improving our services

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content:
We use your information to:
• Process bookings, orders, and payments
• Send confirmations and important notifications
• Improve our services and personalize your experience
• Communicate special offers (with your consent)
• Comply with legal obligations

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We implement industry-standard security measures including:
• SSL encryption for all data transmission
• Secure payment processing via trusted providers
• Regular security audits and updates
• Limited access to personal data on need-to-know basis

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content:
We use cookies to:
• Remember your preferences and settings
• Analyze site traffic and usage patterns
• Provide personalized content
• Enable essential site functionality

You can control cookie settings in your browser.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Request correction of inaccurate data
• Request deletion of your data
• Opt-out of marketing communications
• Export your data in a portable format

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content:
We may share limited data with:
• Payment processors for secure transactions
• Email service providers for communications
• Analytics services (anonymized data only)

We never sell your personal information.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully
terms.contactUs: Contact our legal team for clarification

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using V2 Resort's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.content:
V2 Resort provides:
• Restaurant dining and food ordering
• Chalet accommodations and bookings
• Pool access and ticket reservations
• Snack bar services

All services are subject to availability.

bookings.title: Bookings & Reservations
bookings.content:
• All bookings require valid payment information
• Cancellation policies vary by service type
• Chalets: Free cancellation 48 hours before check-in
• Pool tickets: Non-refundable
• Restaurant reservations: Cancel 2 hours in advance

conduct.title: Guest Conduct
conduct.content:
Guests must:
• Respect other guests and staff
• Follow resort rules and safety guidelines
• Not engage in illegal activities on premises
• Report any issues to staff immediately
• Supervise children at all times

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
V2 Resort is not liable for:
• Personal belongings left on premises
• Injuries resulting from failure to follow safety rules
• Weather-related service interruptions
• Third-party service failures

Our maximum liability is limited to the amount paid for services.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.subtitle: Understanding our cancellation terms
cancellation.contactUs: Contact our support team for assistance

general.title: General Policy
general.content: We understand that plans change. Our cancellation policy is designed to be fair to both guests and our business. Please review the specific policies for each service type below.

chalets.title: Chalet Bookings
chalets.content:
• Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in
• Cancellations within 48 hours: 50% charge
• No-shows: Full charge
• Early departure: No refund for unused nights
• Modifications: Subject to availability

restaurant.title: Restaurant Reservations
restaurant.content:
• Free cancellation up to 2 hours before reservation
• Late cancellations may affect future booking priority
• Large group bookings (8+): 24-hour cancellation notice required
• Pre-ordered meals: Subject to preparation costs

pool.title: Pool Tickets
pool.content:
• Pool tickets are non-refundable once purchased
• Tickets can be rescheduled up to 24 hours before the session
• Weather cancellations: Full credit for future visit
• Medical emergencies: Contact us for special consideration

refunds.title: Refund Process
refunds.content:
• Eligible refunds are processed within 5-7 business days
• Refunds are issued to the original payment method
• Credit card refunds may take additional time to appear
• Store credit can be issued as an alternative

exceptions.title: Special Circumstances
exceptions.content:
We may make exceptions for:
• Medical emergencies with documentation
• Natural disasters or severe weather
• Government travel restrictions
• Bereavement (immediate family)

Please contact us directly for these situations.
